ctu_text: The Scholarship will be given to all Scheduled Castes students who are studying in Government ITI&#39;s situated in Haryana State. \n 1. The students should belong to the Scheduled Castes of Haryana. \n 1.

ctu_text:
**Step 02:** Enter the Parivar Pehchaan Patra (Family Id), and a List of members will be displayed, Select your Name and Click on the &quot;Generate OTP&quot; button. 
**Step 03:** Enter the OTP received on your registered Mobile Number and Click on the &quot;Verify OTP&quot; button. 
**Step 04:** After OTP Verification, all the details get auto-filled in the Registration Form, cross-check your information. 
**Step 05:** Select Your Department and College, create your Password, and click on the &quot;Register&quot; Button.

ctu_text:
**Step 02:** Check eligibility for the scholarship and select the scholarship scheme. 
**Step 03:** Click on the “Apply” button and provide all necessary details like Course, Roll No. , Eligibility, etc. 
**Step 04:** Save your application and then submit the application form after careful verification.
